name: The 2nd International Academic Conference on public art and human development
content: The 2nd International Academic Conference on public art and human development (ICPAHD 2022) will be held on December 23-25, 2022 in Kunming,China. ICPAHD is to bring together researchers, engineers and practitioners interested in the field of such areas on both theoretical and practical aspects about modern education and information management to communicate and exchange with their research. Topics of interest for submission include, but are not limited to: 1\. Public Art Decorate the base Sculpture foundation Materials and technology Architectural and environmental design Spatial form design Display design Public landscape design Landscape architecture design Design of public facilities Environmental sculpture Murals and reliefs Digital graphics processing Public administration Changes in public governance Public services 2.Human Development Health transmission Mental health Development of people's livelihood Green environment Health management Health emergency system Humanistic quality Sociology Human history Humanistic care Humanitarian The aesthetic Cultural inheritance and development Ethical education Please contact us Conference Secretary: Jules Feng E-mail: icpahd@163.com Tel/WeChat: +86-18922775443
